body: This will crash if k_in is int64, as is explicitly allowed by the op registration.  If it didn't crash, it would silently truncate to 32 bits.
body_html: This will crash if k_in is int64, as is explicitly allowed by the op registration. If it didn't crash, it would silently truncate to 32 bits.
